solution_line_template: She does {loads_per_week} loads of laundry a week and used {sheets_per_load} dryer sheet per load for a total of {loads_per_week}*{sheets_per_load} = <<{loads_per_week}*{sheets_per_load}={sheets_per_week}>>{sheets_per_week} dryer sheets in a week

She used {sheets_per_week} dryer sheets per week for {weeks_per_year} weeks for a total of {sheets_per_week}*{weeks_per_year} = <<{sheets_per_week}*{weeks_per_year}={total_sheets_per_year}>>{total_sheets_per_year} dryer sheets
Her box of dryer sheets has {sheets_per_box} sheets so she needs {total_sheets_per_year}/{sheets_per_box} = {boxes_needed} boxes of dryer sheets

Each box costs ${cost_per_box} and she used {boxes_needed} boxes so she now saves {cost_per_box}*{boxes_needed} = $<<{cost_per_box}*{boxes_needed}={money_saved}>>{money_saved} by not buying dryer sheets
